summary.para: Unlocks a Media Foundation transform (MFT) so that the application can use it.

param.name: pUnkMFT
param.para: A pointer to the IUnknown interface of the MFT.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method authenticates the caller, using a private communication channel between the MFT and the object that implements the interface. The details of the communication depend entirely on the implementation.

summary.para: Enables an application to use a Media Foundation transform (MFT) that has restrictions on its use.

remarks.para: If you register an MFT that requires unlocking, include the MFT_ENUM_FLAG_FIELDOFUSE flag when you call the function.
